arts.ttl: Latest Arsenal injury news for Ipswich clash amid huge Saka scare
arts.sum: Mikel Arteta has been handed two fresh Arsenal injury concerns following the 5-1 Premier League win against Crystal Palace. Declan Rice and Riccardo Calafiori handed Arteta a double boost in the build up as the duo returned to the matchday squad for the trip to Selhurst Park.

arts.ttl: Arsenal transfer news: Viktor Gyokeres claims as '£50m deal agreed'
arts.sum: Arsenal could be set for a busy January transfer window, with the Gunners expected to strengthen their squad next month and also ship out some of their fringe players

arts.ttl: GARY KEOWN: Why the thought of Kieran Tierney and Callum McGregor being back together at Celtic is a matter of sadness - not celebration
arts.sum: THE very thought of it has Celtic supporters giddy with delight.

arts.ttl: How 'wonderful' Jesus keeps on scoring for Arsenal
arts.sum: Match of the Day's Gary Lineker, Alan Shearer and Ashley Williams discuss Gabriel Jesus' "wonderful" performance for Arsenal in their 5-1 win at Crystal Palace.

arts.ttl: Arsenal, Man United given Leroy Sane transfer answer as Bayern winger confirms contract stance
arts.sum: Bayern Munich winger Leroy Sane confirms that he wants to stay at the Allianz Arena despite links with a move to either Arsenal or Chelsea.

arts.ttl: Gabriel Martinelli shares heartwarming moment with Ian Wright after scoring against Crystal Palace as he reveals how Arsenal legend helped him after recent criticism
arts.sum: Arsenal winger Gabriel Martinelli shared a heartwarming moment with Ian Wright after scoring against Crystal Palace. Martinelli was on target as Mikel Arteta's side won 5-1.

arts.ttl: Papers: Arsenal, Man City and Bayern in three-way battle for Olmo
arts.sum: The top stories and transfer rumours from Sunday's newspapers...

arts.ttl: Eddie Howe sets Alexander Isak Newcastle January transfer stance amid Arsenal striker hunt
arts.sum: Newcastle United boss Eddie Howe is confident Alexander Isak will remain at St James' Park, despite long-standing reported interest from Premier League rivals Arsenal . “We absolutely want to keep Alex at the football club,” the Newcastle boss told the media after their win on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Jamie Redknapp sends Mikel Arteta transfer message as Arsenal star extends amazing record
arts.sum: Gabriel Jesus scored another two goals for Arsenal to put Crystal Palace to the sword at Selhurst Park and Mikel Arteta has been told that the Brazilian should stay in his team

arts.ttl: Arsenal given bold Man United fixture instruction after Bukayo Saka injury blow
arts.sum: Paul Merson believes former club Arsenal are going to have to'sacrifice' their FA Cup third round tie with Manchester United next month, just so they are able to cope with their congested fixture schedule. Newcastle United (H) - Carabao Cup SF first leg - Jan 7/8
